column2: hamburger: 1 lb, salt: 1/4 tsp, Progresso minestrone soup: 1 ea, ranch style chili bean: 2 ea, rotel diced tomatoes and green chilies: 1 ea
column3: Fry a pound of hamburger and drain (use paper towel after drain), Lightly salt fried hamburger, In a large pot put soup beans tomatoes and hamburger, Heat on medium heat
